item.description:
meet fellow non-believers for pizza and lively talk

***Our Good for Goodness Sake Campaign continues with a Toys for Tots drive at this meeting:

Please bring an unwrapped toy or toys to this meeting.

Retired Armed Forces Association
135 Garfield Ave
New London, CT

They are one of the locations that are collecting these toys and I choose them as our drop off site, as we will include with our donation, a Seasons Greeting Card signed by all of our members who contributed to the drive or showed up to this meeting and thank them for their services to our country. (Yes, the card will have our logo and web address on it in a subtle way. :)

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI monthly meetup
